main event: An observer reported seeing several round red lights every night from 19 October 1968 until 16 December 1968 in Leavenworth, Washington.
interesting points: The lights were observed for up to 2 hours without changing or disappearing., The lights changed colors from reddish-green to bright white and then to orange., At times, the lights moved erratically and displayed sudden acceleration., The observer noted at least 3 to 5 spherical objects close to each other during the sightings., The phenomenon was visible under clear weather conditions.
sighted object: several round red lights in the sky
witness description: Various residents including a newspaper correspondent
